languages.text: "Откровенность? О чем вы — просто старая Ризза приврать любит, когда впечатление произвести хочет! Мало ли что дама сболтнула, увидев важных господ..."
"Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."
languages.original_text: "Откровенность? О чем вы — просто старая Ризза приврать любит, когда впечатление произвести хочет! Мало ли что дама сболтнула, увидев важных господ..."

traits.locale_text: "Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."
"Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."
"Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."
"Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."
"Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."
"Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."

languages.text: 「告白？何のことだ？リザは感銘を与えたいときには話に尾ひれをつけるのが好きなんだ！重要な人物の前では、彼女の言うことなんてほとんどがでたらめさ…」
languages.original_text: "Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."

traits.locale_text: 「告白？何のことだ？リザは感銘を与えたいときには話に尾ひれをつけるのが好きなんだ！重要な人物の前では、彼女の言うことなんてほとんどがでたらめさ…」

languages.text: « Un aveu ? Mais qu'est-ce que vous racontez ? La vieille Ryzza prend juste un peu de plaisir à enjoliver ses histoires quand elle veut impressionner son auditoire ! Si vous saviez les âneries qu'elle raconte devant les gens importants... »
languages.original_text: "Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."

traits.locale_text: « Un aveu ? Mais qu'est-ce que vous racontez ? La vieille Ryzza prend juste un peu de plaisir à enjoliver ses histoires quand elle veut impressionner son auditoire ! Si vous saviez les âneries qu'elle raconte devant les gens importants... »

languages.text: “认罪？你这说的是什么话？老莱萨只是想给自己脸上贴贴金，让别人觉得了不起罢了！毕竟，这可是这么重要的人物，老莱萨肯定得多信口开河几句才行……”
languages.original_text: "Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."

traits.locale_text: “认罪？你这说的是什么话？老莱萨只是想给自己脸上贴贴金，让别人觉得了不起罢了！毕竟，这可是这么重要的人物，老莱萨肯定得多信口开河几句才行……”

languages.text: "Geständnis? Wovon redet Ihr da? Die alte Ryzza schmückt nur gerne alles ein wenig aus, wenn sie Eindruck schinden will! In Anwesenheit wichtiger Personen kommt eben auch mal Unsinn raus ..."
languages.original_text: "Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."

traits.locale_text: "Geständnis? Wovon redet Ihr da? Die alte Ryzza schmückt nur gerne alles ein wenig aus, wenn sie Eindruck schinden will! In Anwesenheit wichtiger Personen kommt eben auch mal Unsinn raus ..."

languages.text: «¿Confesión? ¿Qué dice? ¡La vieja Ryzza siempre exagera para llamar la atención! Menudas tonterías suelta cuando hay gente importante delante...».
languages.original_text: "Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Confesión? ¿Qué dice? ¡La vieja Ryzza siempre exagera para llamar la atención! Menudas tonterías suelta cuando hay gente importante delante...».

languages.text: "İtiraf mı? Ne itirafı? Koca Ryzza, milleti etkilemek istediğinde her şeyi abarta abarta anlatır! Önemli insan görünce nasıl saçmaladığını bilmeyen yok..."
languages.original_text: "Confession? What are you on about? Old Ryzza just likes to embellish when she wants to make an impression! The nonsense she spouts in the presence of important people..."

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf mı? Ne itirafı? Koca Ryzza, milleti etkilemek istediğinde her şeyi abarta abarta anlatır! Önemli insan görünce nasıl saçmaladığını bilmeyen yok..."
